posts.post_content: Looking to buy some lower grade T201's for my set that I am building.  Looking for the 1-3 graded range and also raw cards that would fit that range. Please let me know if you have any for sale.  Thanks.

I have a few T201's BIN on eBay as we speak, just make me an offer (online or offline).

[url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?item=251104428489&pt=US_Baseball&_sop=1&hash=item3a76fd81c9&_ssn=iggy-man&rt=nc&LH_BIN=1[/url]

Lovely Day...

I have a decent Cobb/Crawford that I would sell for a bit less by check/m.o.:

[URL="http://www.ebay.com/itm/1911-T201-Ty-Cobb-Sam-Crawford-Mecca-double-folder-Vintage-Tobacco-Baseball-Card-/261062893577"]T201 Cobb/Crawford on ebay[/URL]
